'''Melairbode''' was the home of the [[Melairkyn]], an ancient dwarven clan that was later wiped out. Their vast network of caverns and chambers was later known as [[Undermountain]]. Melairbode was frequently raided by [[drow]]. Despite their best efforts, the dwarves succumbed in [[211 DR]].

History.{{Yearlink|-1288}}: King [[Melair I]] begins mining [[mithral]] ore on the site.
History.[[34 DR]]: King [[Melair IV]] is slain in a huge drow invasion which forces the dwarves to retreat lower into the mountain.
History.[[211 DR]]: The dwarves disappear from their ancient home for the last time.
